welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Goole, the charming town known for its stunning waterways and friendly locals! We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humberside International Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
